com.isoterik.mgdx.m2d.scenes

Class TiledMapScene

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.isoterik.mgdx.Scene
      • com.isoterik.mgdx.m2d.scenes.TiledMapScene
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.badlogic.gdx.physics.box2d.ContactListener

    public class TiledMapScene
extends Scene
    A scene that is capable of rendering a TiledMap. It uses OrthoCachedTiledMapRenderer for rendering by default but can be changed.

      • TiledMapScene

        public TiledMapScene(java.lang.String mapFileName,
                     float unitScale)
        Creates a new instance given the fileName of the map file and a unit scale. This constructor will block until the map is loaded.
        Parameters:
        mapFileName - the fileName of the map file
        unitScale - the unit scale.

    • Method Detail

      • renderTiledMap

        protected void renderTiledMap(GameCamera2d gameCamera2d)
        Renders the map on the scene. Subclasses can override this method to provide custom rendering. Note: the map is always rendered first. Every other thing will be rendered on top of it including GameObjects that can be rendered.
        Parameters:
        gameCamera2d - the 2D game camera

      • __render

        public void __render()
        Description copied from class: Scene
        Called when this scene is rendered. DO NOT CALL THIS METHOD!
        Overrides:
        __render in class Scene

      • getTileObjects

        public com.badlogic.gdx.utils.Array<com.badlogic.gdx.maps.tiled.objects.TiledMapTileMapObject> getTileObjects(com.badlogic.gdx.maps.MapLayer mapLayer,
                                                                                                              java.lang.String propertyName,
                                                                                                              java.lang.String value)
        Gets all tile objects in a given layer that has a property whose value matches the one given. Because TiledMapTileMapObjects have two kinds of properties (default and own properties), this method will merge the properties before making the search.
        Parameters:
        mapLayer - the layer
        propertyName - the property name. use * to retrieve everything
        value - the property value to check
        Returns:
        an array of found objects

      • getTileObjects

        public com.badlogic.gdx.utils.Array<com.badlogic.gdx.maps.tiled.objects.TiledMapTileMapObject> getTileObjects(java.lang.String propertyName,
                                                                                                              java.lang.String value)
        Gets all tile objects in every layer that has a property whose value matches the one given. Because TiledMapTileMapObjects have two kinds of properties (default and own properties), this method will merge the properties before making the search.
        Parameters:
        propertyName - the property name. use * to retrieve everything
        value - the property value to check
        Returns:
        an array of found objects
